name: draco-plate
effect: Held: Increases the power of the holder’s Dragon moves by 20%. Held by a Multitype Pokémon: Holder’s type becomes Dragon.
short_effect: Held: Dragon-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage. Changes Arceus’s and Judgment’s type to Dragon.

flavor_text.sun_moon: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It’s a stone tablet that boosts the power of Dragon-type moves.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It’s a stone tablet that boosts the power of Dragon-type moves.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It’s a stone tablet that boosts the power of Dragon-type moves.
